Text:
NFO: 
To their impassioned cult of fans, New Model Army was one of the best post-punk outfits Great Britain ever produced. Combining the gut-level force of punk with the anthemic political fervor of U2 and The Alarm, as well as the urban protest folk of Billy Bragg...
Thanks for the summary Indiox, I'd say it's spot on :) And np, I'm glad you guys are checking this music out. Believe me, it's worth the download. I've been hooked since 8-9 years back. ;)
